Report.Caption: Продажби и консигнации
Report.SQL: SELECT o.date as [Дата], p.Company as [Фирма], p.Company2, p.Phone, p.Address as [Адрес на Обекта], p.City as [Град на Обекта], CASE o.OperType WHEN 15 then g.Name ELSE '' END AS 'Дадена машина', CASE o.OperType WHEN 15 then g.Catalog1 ELSE '' END AS 'Сериен номер на машина', CASE o.OperType WHEN 15 then o.Note ELSE '' END AS 'Забележка дадена машина', CASE o.OperType WHEN 17 then g.Name ELSE '' END AS 'Върната машина', CASE o.OperType WHEN 17 then o.Note ELSE '' END AS 'Забележка Върната машина', CASE o.OperType WHEN 2 then g.Name ELSE '' END AS 'Продажба', CASE o.OperType WHEN 2 then SUM(o.PriceOUT*o.QTTY) ELSE '' END AS saleprice2, SUM(o.QTTY) as [Ко-во], SUM(o.PriceIN*o.QTTY) AS delevery, CASE o.OperType WHEN 2 then SUM(o.PriceOUT*o.QTTY)-SUM(o.PriceIN*o.QTTY) ELSE '' END AS win1, CASE o.OperType WHEN 15 then SUM(o.PriceOUT*o.QTTY)-SUM(o.PriceIN*o.QTTY) ELSE '' END AS win2 FROM Operations o LEFT JOIN Partners p ON p.ID=o.PartnerID LEFT JOIN Goods g ON g.ID=o.GoodID LEFT JOIN Objects ob ON ob.ID=o.ObjectID WHERE o.OperType in (2,15,17) $datata $imenapartner $imenaobekt Group BY o.date,p.Company,o.OperType,g.Name,p.Address, p.City, p.Company2, p.Phone, o.Note, g.Catalog1 Order by o.OperType DESC
